> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **tunisian moss stitch washcloth** this pattern combines two basic tunisian stitches to create a gorgeous variation on the tunisian moss stitch which i am calling the extended tunisian moss stitch in the traditional knit moss stitch pattern you alternate between knit and purl stitches changing up the order every two row this stitch pattern is wonderfully meditative has hardly any curl at all which can be a challenge with tunisian crochet and i absolutely love how it turned out this project is easy to follow with written instructions and a helpful visual guides the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth 85yds / 78m * tea towel 390yds / 357m *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton aran 6 **hook ** 6 5mm k-10 5 crochet hook 7 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 8 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2024 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/free-crochet-dishcloth-patterns/ 2 https //www laughinghens com/knitting-wool/drops-paris#nedandmimi 3 https //shrsl com/4cok0 4 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/paintbox-yarns-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 5 https //lovecrafts com/en-us/p/lion-brand-24-7-cotton utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 6 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/rico-creative-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 7 https //shrsl com/3p74i 8 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
